H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H1870.def: = an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3190.def: = causative action by which humans cause objects to be in a better state of maintenance than before

H5186.def: = state in which a relatively straight object is shaped into a curve

H241.def: = one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H4156.def: = action by which humans exercise their minds to determine how they are going to achieve a particular purpose

H3820.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H268.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H4714.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}; ► regarded as founder of the {L:Egyptian<SDBH:מִצְרִי>} nation

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H5650.def: = man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

H5030.def: = male person speaking on behalf of a deity

H241.def: = one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry

H7185.def: = process by which humans experience an event as difficult to handle or hard to accept

H7489.def: literally: to make (one's deeds) wrong; hence: = action by which humans behave in an evil or harmful way

H1.def: = direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7121.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H6030.def: = action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H4148.def: = causative action by which deities offer primarily verbal instruction to humans, which may occasionally be accompanied by physical punishment, given as a result of misbehavior or to prevent misbehavior, ► aimed to teach the receiver (and sometimes other people as well) wisdom and good behavior

H530.def: = state in which an object does not move

H6.def: = state of not being located in the place where it is expected to be

H3772.def: = causative action by which humans use a knife or another sharp implement to remove something from a larger object

H1494.def: = causative action by which humans cut off their hair, or the wool of a sheep or other animal

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H7015.def: = a sung dirge or lament at the death of a loved one; ◄ death of a friend or family member; ► expression of loss at one's death

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3988.def: = state in which humans or deities are unwilling to engage in any way with (other) humans or deities, or with other objects and events

H5203.def: = process by which ropes that used to be tightly strung begin to hang loose

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H5002.def: = action by which humans or deities make a prophetic statement; in the case of a deity this is usually done through the mouth of a prophet or seer

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H8251.def: = an object that is regarded as unclean and therefore treated as utterly detestable

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H7121.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H2930.def: = process by which humans, or objects are or become contaminated, ◄ as a result of contagious diseases or conditions, unlawful activities, or contact with what has been contaminated, ► which often results in their inability of being used or participating in social and religious activities, until this state is reversed through prescribed rituals and procedures

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H3820.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H2028.def: = the killing of domestic animals for food, sometimes extended to refer to the killing of people in a cruel and violent way

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H4725.def: = a specific area or point in space

H5038.def: = the dead body of humans or animals

H3978.def: = any nutritious substance that people or animals eat or drink ► in order to maintain life and growth

H8064.def: = the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

H929.def: often used as collective: = general term for any land animal, as opposed to {L:humans<SDBH:אָדָם>}, {L:birds<SDBH:עֹוף>}, {L:reptiles<SDBH:רֶמֶשׂ>}, {L:insects<SDBH:שֶׁרֶץ>}, and {L:fish<SDBH:דָּג>}

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H2729.def: = state/process by which inanimate objects shake or tremble violently

H7673.def: = process by which an activity comes to an end

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H2351.def: = referent to the location outside of an object

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H8342.def: poetic term; = state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy

H8057.def: = state in which humans feel and show great joy

H2860.def: = man who is about to be married or has just been married; ≈ often associated with joy

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H2723.def: = state in which a land, building, or town has been totally destroyed, ► to the extent that nobody can live there anymore
